original_text: Some men from Sheba suddenly came and they attacked us. They took away all your oxen and your donkeys. They also killed all your other servants. I was the only one who escaped. I ran here to tell you what has happened.’
korean_text: 스바 사람이 갑자기 이르러 그것들을 빼앗고 칼로 종들을 죽였나이다 나만 홀로 피하였으므로 주인께 아뢰러 왔나이다

sentences.original_text: Some men from Sheba suddenly came
They took away all your oxen
They also killed all your other servants
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 또한 당신의 다른 모든 종들을 죽였습니다

sentences.original_text: I was the only one who escaped
I ran here to tell you
sentences.korean_translation: 제가 당신에게 말하기 위해 여기까지 달려왔습니다
